WorkItem.Description:
This request is from Rub member of the uNhAddIns project (Unofficial addins for NHibernate): http://code.google.com/p/unhaddins/

The current scripts use Identity to auto-generate primary keys. Although NHibernate supports Identity, it is not a good solution for it, as described below:
http://nhforge.org/blogs/nhibernate/archive/2008/12/21/identity-the-never-ending-story.aspx

We need to add support for nhibernate HiLo generation. For example, the Genre table would be:

CREATE TABLE Genre 
( 
    GenreId INTEGER NOT NULL, //  IDENTITY - no identity  here 
    Name NVARCHAR(120),
    PRIMARY KEY(GenreId)
);
WorkItem.Summary: Feature Request: Add Support for NHibernate HiLo generator
